blog.title: Generating AI images, paying anonymously and little
blog.description: I implement anonymous micro-payments for AI image generation using Ethereum Layer-2. See how to connect blockchain payments with serverless AI for sustainable, privacy-focused services.

prevBlog.title: My short lived contact with the world of VCs in Germany
prevBlog.description: I explore the challenges of transitioning from quantum research to startup entrepreneurship. Valuable lessons about VC funding, deep tech development, and German startup realities.

nextBlog.title: Updates to the website
nextBlog.description: I explore my website's evolution over 6 months, from minimal CSS to Panda CSS and Copilot refactoring. See how modern tools dramatically boost development productivity.
